tabs.Overview:
Akiyoshi is one of the deuteragonist of [[tboah]] and a member of [[a-class]]. He is the inheritor of [[Union Prime|Union Prime's]] powers and possess a strong sense of moral justice.

[[toc]]

# Appearance
Akiyoshi is a scrawny kid with dark hair and green eyes. He stand a bit shorter than average. He is often wearing normal clothes but sometimes wear Union Prime merchandizes.

# Personality
Akiyoshi possess a strong sense of Justice, often going out of his way to help others who are in need and even sacrifice himself should he need to. He is also kind and always gentle with others. But Akiyoshi can be quite timid against those with a more domineering personality, however, when the situation needs it, Akiyoshi can be one of the bravest kids out there.
